CustomField.description: This field is to be used by automations and is not visible to users on the page layout. The picklist value selected will update the Contact record with the equivalent 'Site' checkbox, which in turn will allow the contact and volunteer hour record to be shared. **NOTE: If a new value is added to this list, the following will also be required: 1. Create equivalent checkbox in Contact&Volunteer object (see similar checkboxes) 2. Update the Contact Share by Site sharing rule
CustomField.label: Site Source
